overview: Tomorrow Today contains the most progressive surfing ever captured on film. The film fuses animated dream sequences into reality, where each surfer performs his repertoire of unbelievable tricks. Tomorrow Today bridges the gap between the present and the future.  The film features best career performances to date from Dane Reynolds, Bobby Martinez, Mike Lossness, Yadin Nicol, and the futuristic talents of Clay Marzo.
title: Tomorrow Today
